cleaned_text: The Center for Natural & Integrative Medicine Wellness and Fitness Services Orlando, Florida 50 followers Your Bridge to Health, Hope & Healing About us At the Center for Natural & Integrative Medicine, we strive to become your partner in health. Our mission is to provide a bridge to health, hope, and healing using an integrative functional approach. We look for and find the root cause. We inspire and empower you to live extraordinary lives by nourishing yourself from the inside out. We support you and help you discover a personalized, integrative approach for both men and women to optimize vitality and vibrant health. We test, identify, and treat imbalances of hormones, vitamins, micronutrients as well as remove obstacles to healing such as toxins, allergens, and heavy metals. By treating the whole person, our programs optimize immune function, decrease illness, and enhance the positive outcome for health and well-being. - Website - [http://drkalidas.com](https://www.linkedin.com/redir/redirect?url=http%3A%2F%2Fdrkalidas%2Ecom&urlhash=Eom5&trk=about_website) External link for The Center for Natural & Integrative Medicine - Industries - Wellness and Fitness Services - Company size - 11-50 employees - Headquarters - Orlando, Florida - Type - Privately Held - Founded - 2010 - Specialties - Integrative Medicine, Functional Medicine, Lyme disease, Cancer, Hormonal Health, Digestive Health, Adrenal Health, and IV Therapy Locations - Primary 6651 Vineland Rd Orlando, Florida 32819, US [Get directions](https://www.bing.com/maps?where=6651+Vineland+Rd+Orlando+32819+Florida+US&trk=org-locations_url) - [Get directions](https://www.bing.com/maps?where=US&trk=org-locations_url) Employees at The Center for Natural & Integrative Medicine - Elizabeth Cohen Meditation, Mindfulness & Healing | Mindfulness-Based Stress Reduction Instructor - Sandra Ruiz - Jessica Ball Integrative Health Specialist at The Center for Natural & Integrative Medicine - Lareece Long Life Within Bio-Photonic Energy Lymphatic Drainage at The Center for Natural and Integrative Medicine (lion) [See all employees](https://www.linkedin.com/signup?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fsearch%2Fresults%2Fpeople%2F%3FfacetCurrentCompany%3D%255B3872108%255D&trk=public_biz_employees-join) Similar pages - Modern Integrative Psychiatry Mental Health Care New York, NY - Denver Dermatology Center, LLC Medical Practices Denver, Colorado - Natural Integrative Healthcare Wellness and Fitness Services Alexandria, VA - SomniWell Integrative Natural Health Wellness and Fitness Services - DENTANEXT MEDIA E-Learning Providers Boston, Massachusetts - SWFL Integrative Medicine Fort Myers, Florida - KRAUSE INTEGRATIVE MEDICINE, INC.
